metadata.Description: A situation where individuals lack sufficient time to meet their basic needs and participate fully in society.

relations.Description: Time poverty addresses the need for sustainable development by recognizing the importance of time as a valuable resource for individuals and communities.
relations.Subject: time poverty

relations.Description: Time poverty contributes to inequality by limiting individuals' access to resources and opportunities due to their lack of time.
relations.Subject: time poverty

relations.Description: Time poverty supports the importance of achieving a work-life balance by highlighting the need for individuals to have enough time for both work and personal life.
relations.Subject: time poverty

relations.Description: Time poverty measures the impact on productivity by assessing the efficiency and effectiveness of individuals' use of time.
relations.Subject: time poverty
